DOC.criteria: 1 . Nondiabetic men woman age 1865 year old 2 . Written inform consent obtain 3 . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 27 kg/m2 4 . Fasting triglyceride < 2.5 mmol/l 5 . Waist circumference < 90 cm 6 . Fasting blood glucose < 6 mmol/l 7 . Haemoglobin 130 g/L . 1 . Patient history hepatitis/hepatic disease active within previous 2 year . 2 . Any significant active ( past 12 month ) disease gastrointestinal , pulmonary , neurological , renal ( creatinine [ Cr ] > 1.5 mg/dL ) genitourinary , hematological system ; severe uncontrolled treat untreated hypertension ( sit diastolic blood pressure [ BP ] > 100 systolic > 180 ) ; proliferative retinopathy . 3 . Fasting blood glucose > 6 mmol/l know diabetes . 4 . Any history myocardial infarction ( MI ) clinically significant , active , cardiovascular history include history arrhythmias conduction delay electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , unstable angina , decompensated heart failure . 5 . Any laboratory value : AST > 2x upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; ALT > 2x ULN ; thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) > 6 mU/l . 6 . Known suspected allergy medication history multiple and/or severe allergy drug food history severe anaphylactic reaction . 7 . Current addiction alcohol substance abuse determine investigator . 8 . Mental incapacity , unwillingness language barrier preclude adequate understanding cooperation 9 . Any lipid lowering hypoglycemic agent 10 . Will donate blood three month start three month complete study . 11 . Thrombocytopenia
